title: Drawing, September 1844
markings: Stamped in ink, at lower left:  Lugt 457c
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at upper right:  The rock-covered with grey / greenish, green, black and other / mosses and ferns, likewise / the crevices and juttings - / Upper part of the tree lighted / brilliant with yellow sunlight / Sept. 1844; and again at various locations through lower center: moss/ moss/ grey rock / grass and rock / various ferns plants etc. / grass / sand .
description:
Recto: Vertical view of a moss covered, fern filled, rocky stream bank in lower foreground with three pine trees filling the middleground.

Verso: Horizontal study of a cow's head at left and an outlined figure wearing a high-crowned hat, seen from the back.
